General.Name: Shenzhen Universe Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Universe Group Co., Ltd. engages in the production of commercial concrete in China. The company manufactures and sells concrete products, including ordinary and special concretes, such as impermeability, bending resistance, slow setting, early strength, corrosion resistance and ready-mixed mortar concretes. It is also engaged in real estate development and property management businesses. Shenzhen Universe Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1981 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.
